verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H3772>make<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them in <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H859>Ye<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and unto <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and unto <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H776>land;<s%>

The <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4531>temptations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> the <S%H226>signs,<s%> and <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> miracles: <S%H4159><s%>

Yet the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> you a <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>perceive,<s%> and <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H241>ears<s%> to <S%H8085>hear,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And I have <S%H1980>led<s%> you <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> your <S%H8008>clothes<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> waxen <S%H1086>old<s%> <S%H4480>upon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> you, and thy <S%H5275>shoe<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> waxen <S%H1086>old<s%> <S%H4480>upon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy <S%H7272>foot.<s%>

Ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have ye <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or strong <S%H7941>drink:<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> ye might <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

And when ye <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> us unto <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and we <S%H5221>smote<s%> them:

And we <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> unto the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and to the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4520>Manasseh.<s%>

Keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853>therefore<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them, <S%H4616>that<s%> ye may <S%H7919>prosper<s%> <S%H853><s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye <S%H6213>do.<s%>

Ye <S%H859><s%> <S%H5324>stand<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> your <S%H7218>captains<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> your <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and your <S%H7860>officers,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

Your little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> your <S%H802>wives,<s%> and thy <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H7130>in<s%> thy <S%H4264>camp,<s%> from the <S%H4480>hewer<s%> <S%H2404><s%> of thy <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H7579>drawer<s%> of thy water: <S%H4325><s%>

That thou shouldest <S%H5674>enter<s%> into <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and into his <S%H423>oath,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3772>maketh<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee this day: <S%H3117><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> he may <S%H6965>establish<s%> thee <S%H3117>today<s%> for a <S%H5971>people<s%> unto himself, and that <S%H1931>he<s%> may <S%H1961>be<s%> unto thee a <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H1696>said<s%> unto thee, and <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
Neither <S%H3808><s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you <S%H905>only<s%> do <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H3772>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H423>oath;<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5975>standeth<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> us this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> and also <S%H854>with<s%> him <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> us this day: <S%H3117><s%>

(For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>how<s%> we have <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and <S%H834>how<s%> we <S%H5674>came<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye passed <S%H5674>by;<s%>

And ye have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H8251>abominations,<s%> and their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5973>among<s%> them: )

Lest <S%H6435><s%> there should <S%H3426>be<s%> among you <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4940>family,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7626>tribe,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> turneth <S%H6437>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> there should <S%H3426>be<s%> among you a <S%H8328>root<s%> that <S%H6509>beareth<s%> <S%H7219>gall<s%> and <S%H3939>wormwood;<s%>

And it come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when he <S%H8085>heareth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H423>curse,<s%> that he bless <S%H1288>himself<s%> in his <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> I <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of mine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H4616>to<s%> <S%H5595>add<s%> <S%H7302>drunkenness<s%> <S%H854>to<s%> thirst: <S%H6771><s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H14>will<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5545>spare<s%> him, <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> and his <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> shall <S%H6225>smoke<s%> against <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H423>curses<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> shall <S%H7257>lie<s%> upon him, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall blot <S%H4229>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> from <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H914>separate<s%> him unto <S%H7451>evil<s%> out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H423>curses<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> of the law: <S%H8451><s%>

So that the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> of your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> <S%H310><s%> you, and the <S%H5237>stranger<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H4480>land,<s%> <S%H776><s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> when they <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4347>plagues<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and the <S%H8463>sicknesses<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H2470>laid<s%> upon it;

And that the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> thereof is <S%H1614>brimstone,<s%> and <S%H4417>salt,<s%> and <S%H8316>burning,<s%> that it is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2232>sown,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6779>beareth,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6212>grass<s%> <S%H5927>groweth<s%> therein, like the <S%H4114>overthrow<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> <S%H126>Admah,<s%> and <S%H6636>Zeboim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2015>overthrew<s%> in his <S%H639>anger,<s%> and in his wrath: <S%H2534><s%>

Even <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5921>Wherefore<s%> <S%H4100><s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3602>thus<s%> unto <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> meaneth the <S%H2750>heat<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H639>anger?<s%>

Then men shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5921>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them when he brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

For they <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> them, <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> and whom he had <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2505>given<s%> unto them:

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H853>it<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7045>curses<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> book: <S%H5612><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> rooted them <S%H5428>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> their <S%H127>land<s%> in <S%H639>anger,<s%> and in <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> and in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>indignation,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

The <S%H5641>secret<s%> things belong unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God:<s%> but those things which are <S%H1540>revealed<s%> belong unto us and to our <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> that we may <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law.<s%>
